short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to the Studio Desktop App, used for directly opening files for editing with WoodWing Studio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect Google Chrome to the WoodWing Studio Desktop App, used for directly opening files for editing with WoodWing Studio or WoodWing Content Station.

For example:
- Adobe InDesign Layouts
- Microsoft Office documents
- Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator files 
- and more 

For more detailed information see www.woodwing.com.
